title: Fire Sprite
description: Volume One, A Middle School fantasy novel about young love magic and faeries.In the Land of the Fae, a young girl finds her first love....When Alli runs away after her mother dies, a Faery Fire Sprite takes her to the Land of the Fae to protect her where she discovers she's a witch begins her journey into discovering her lost heritage and finding her destiny. Along the way, she begins to remember what she's forgotten and the heady beginnings of a first love. Now, she must face returning home--and leaving him behind. For he must remain in the Land of the Fae to fulfill his own destiny....They delve deeper into the hidden world of magick and begin to unravel the long-hidden secret about their destiny, their heritage and the danger that surrounds them all. They must unravel the mystery of her destiny, or be forced apart forever....
author: Lenore Wolfe
